meanings.definition: A broad highway designed for high-speed traffic.
meanings.sent1: The superhighway was filled with cars zooming by.
meanings.sent2: We took the superhighway to get to the city quickly.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the superhighway? To get to the other side faster!
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was a superhighway leading straight to success.
meanings.sent5: The superhighway stretched out before us like a ribbon of asphalt.

meanings.definition: A network of high-speed roads designed for fast travel.
meanings.sent1: The superhighway system connected cities across the country.
meanings.sent2: Drivers rely on the superhighway to reach their destinations on time.
meanings.sent3: The superhighway network was so efficient, it felt like teleporting!
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, information flows like a superhighway.
meanings.sent5: Traveling on the superhighway felt like flying on the ground.
